channel.title: Aboutme on chryb's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aboutme on chryb's blog

item.title: Lets Get Started
item.description: Hello, my name is Christoph Biering. I’m here to start a blog about programming, nerdy stuff and my side projects. But first of all, I will write a bit about me and why I’m creating a blog. Don’t be too hard to me. I do not speak native English. I’m not a professional writer, I’m not a person of many words and I don’t even think that I’m good at writing.
